> It's darn tempting, Pam, let me tell you. I sat in a wives' meeting tonight

Pam G.

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] more bitchin'
messages.msgSnippet: ... It s darn tempting, Pam, let me tell you.  I sat in a wives meeting tonight planning some *&^% thing in June that I don t care about, seriously wondering
messages.messageBody:
2/4/03 16:33:

> We have an apartment (separate from the house) It isn't being used right
> now. Welcome to stay here.
> Pam G.

It's darn tempting, Pam, let me tell you. I sat in a wives' meeting tonight
planning some *&^% thing in June that I don't care about, seriously
wondering whether I'd even be here in June.

Maybe I'll just run away for awhile! I think that's what I need this week.

brenda
